00048 extern QueueDescriptor_t bdbEventsubscribersQueue;
00049 
00050 #define RAISE_CALLBACKS_TO_BDBEVENTS_SUBSCRIBERS(queue, callback) \
00051   for (BdbEventSubscriber_t* subscriber = getQueueElem(&queue); subscriber; subscriber = getNextQueueElem(subscriber)) \
00052     if (subscriber->callback) \
00053       subscriber->callback();
00054 
00055 #define RAISE_CALLBACKS_TO_BDBEVENTS_SUBSCRIBERS_WITH_SINGLE_ARGUMENT(queue, callback) \
00056   for (BdbEventSubscriber_t* subscriber = getQueueElem(&queue); subscriber; subscriber = getNextQueueElem(subscriber)) \
00057     if (subscriber->callback) \
00058       subscriber->callback(argument);
00059 
00060 #define RAISE_CALLBACKS_TO_BDBEVENTS_SUBSCRIBERS_WITH_TWO_ARGUMENTS(queue, callback) \
00061   for (BdbEventSubscriber_t* subscriber = getQueueElem(&queue); subscriber; subscriber = getNextQueueElem(subscriber)) \
00062     if (subscriber->callback) \
00063       subscriber->callback(groupIdFirst, groupIdLast);

00282 /**************************************************************************/
00285 typedef struct BdbEventSubscriber_t
00286 {
00287   struct
00288   {
00289     void *next;
00290   }service;
00291   /* Indicates the device has been (re)connected to the network */
00292   void (*connected)(void);
00293   /* Indicates the device has lost it connection to the network.*/
00294   void (*disconnected)(void);
00295   /* Network Formation Completed with Status */
00296   void (*networkFormationCompleted)(BDB_CommissioningStatus_t status);
00297   /* Indicates Network Steering is in progress either in network or not in network */
00298   void (*SteeringNetwork)(void);
00299   /* Indicates steering completion */
00300   void (*SteeringCompleted)(BDB_CommissioningStatus_t status);
00301   /* Indicates Touchlink scanning started */
00302   void (*scanning)(void);
00303   /* Indicates Touchlink identifying the target */
00304   void (*identifying)(void);
00305   /* Indicates joining during touchlink is in progress */
00306   void (*joining)(void);
00307   /* Indicates scan request reception */
00308   void (*scanIndication)(void);
00309   /* Requests the application to identify itself with the given timeout */
00310   void (*identifyStartIndication)(uint16_t timeoutInSec);
00311   /* Requests the application to stop identifying itself */
00312   void (*identifyStopIndication)(void);
00313   /* Requests the application to reset itself to factory defaults */
00314   void (*ResetToFactoryDefaults)(void);
00315   /* Indicates that the device has been linked to a new network by the initiator */
00316   void (*joinNetworkIndication)(uint16_t groupIdFirst, uint16_t groupIdLast);
00317   /* Touchlink Complete with status */
00318   void (*touchlinkCompleted)(BDB_CommissioningStatus_t status);
00319   /* Indication that the network settings of the device have been updated by the initiator.*/
00320   void (*updateNetworkIndication)(void);
00321   /* Indicates Trust center exchange procedure started */
00322   void (*tclkProcedureOngoing)(void);
00323   /* Indicates Trust center exchange procedure completed */
00324   void (*tclkProcedureCompleted)(void);
00325   /* Indicates identify querying for finding and binding */
00326   void (*querying)(void);
00327   /* Indicates identify query completed for finding and binding */
00328   void (*queryingCompleted)(void);
00329   /*Indicates binding links adding ongoing after touchlinking*/
00330   void (*addingBindingLinks)(void);
00331   /*Finding and binding completion with status*/
00332   void (*findingBindingCompleted)(BDB_CommissioningStatus_t status);
00333 #if BDB_FINDINGBINDING_INITIATOR_TARGET_PARALLEL_EXECUTION == 1
00334   /*Finding and binding initiator mode completion*/
00335   void (*findingBindingInitiatorModeCompleted)(void);
00336 #endif
00337 } BdbEventSubscriber_t;
00338
